definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces
to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet

sentences.english: To de fend our country we must strengthen ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 爲了保衛祖國，我們必須自強不息。

sentences.english: After he graduated, he joined the army and devoted himself to making his motherland safe.
sentences.chinese: 畢業之後他參加了部隊，獻身於保衛祖國。

sentences.english: They took up arms in defence of their country.
sentences.chinese: 他們拿起武器保衛祖國。

sentences.english: They fought to defend their country.
sentences.chinese: 他們爲保衛祖國而戰鬥。

sentences.english: They responded at once and rose as one man in defense of their motherland.
sentences.chinese: 他們立即響應，團結得象一個人，起來保衛祖國。

sentences.english: To defend their country, many young people of that village joined the army.
sentences.chinese: 爲了保衛祖國，那個村子裏的很多年輕人蔘軍入伍。

sentences.english: He was ready to charge to the fore for the defence of our motherland.
sentences.chinese: 他隨時準備衝在前頭來保衛祖國。

sentences.english: Is there any man unwilling to fight in defense of his country?
sentences.chinese: 難道有誰不願爲保衛祖國而戰嗎？

sentences.english: Many soldiers fight hard in bloody battles to guard the border.
sentences.chinese: 爲保衛祖國的邊境，許多戰士浴血疆埸。

sentences.english: The soldiers are devoted to defending their motherland.
sentences.chinese: 戰士們獻身於保衛祖國。

sentences.english: We all feel proud that there are many advanced weapons to secure our country.
sentences.chinese: 我們都感到自豪，有許多先進的武器來保衛祖國。

sentences.english: We will fight to the finish to defend our motherland.
sentences.chinese: 我們將爲保衛祖國而打到底。

sentences.english: They were fighting in defense of their country.
sentences.chinese: 他們在爲保衛祖國而戰。

sentences.english: We must defend our motherland from the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須保衛祖國防禦進犯之敵。

sentences.english: We're having good holidays while soldiers are protecting our country.
sentences.chinese: 我們在幸福地享受假期，而士兵們卻在保衛祖國。

sentences.english: I was full of patriotism and wanted to protect the motherland.
sentences.chinese: 當時我洋溢着愛國主義思想，希望保衛祖國。
